name: Exypnos (Infinity)
description:
Exy or Exypnos 

is I.A. created to think like a human 

and he discovery  life and feelings in your journey 

3 finals  make you choice and he destiny controls 

A - D = move 

W = jump

S = cam down

J = spark atak

K = laser atak

please support the game I had a lot of difficulty to make it, dedication to each art sprite and music, I can't sell it here on the site it disappears if I put a price to sell thanks for playng my game
